snippet.title: Back 4 Blood - Game Awards Gameplay Demo
snippet.description:
We never said this fight was going to be easy. Take a look at the Back 4 Blood gameplay demo that debuted on stage at The Video Game Awards 2020. 

On June 22, 2021, Back 4 Blood brings you face-to-face with a new apocalypse on Xbox ONE, Xbox Series X|S, PS5, PS4, Steam, and the Epic Store.

Register TODAY for a chance to play in the closed ALPHA. Servers open on December 17th!
https://go.wbgames.com/B4B-Alpha 

Tune-in to our Gameplay Showcase Livestream 12/17 at 10:00AM PST.

Join us in the fight against the Ridden!
Discord - https://go.wbgames.com/B4BDiscord  
Facebook – https://go.wbgames.com/B4BFacebook 
Twitter – https://go.wbgames.com/B4BTwitter 
Instagram – https://go.wbgames.com/B4BInsta

#Back4Blood #B4B #Gameplay #GameAwards
